chefBio: Nusr-Et is a renowned chef with over 10 years of experience in the Turkish culinary arts. He has  some of the best restaurants around the world and has won several awards for his innovative and delicious dishes.

recipes.name: Kobe
recipes.details: Juicy and flavorful Kobe that's perfect for a weeknight dinner. Made with simple ingredients and ready in under an hour.
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat oven to 425°F.
2. In a small bowl, combine garlic powder, paprika, oregano, salt, and black pepper.
3. Brush both sides of mutton with olive oil, then rub seasoning mix over both sides.
4. Place chicken breasts in a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F.

recipes.name: Toscana
recipes.details: This delicious meal made with a combination of perfect tastes. Cooked and served with thinly sliced New York steak, cherry tomatoes, rocket, parmesan and special sauce.
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.
2. In a food processor, pulse together butter, sugar, and salt until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
3. Add egg yolk and pulse until dough comes together.
4. Dredge the chicken pieces in the flour, shaking off any excess.
5. Brown the chicken pieces on both sides, working in batches if necessary. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and let simmer for about 30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and tender.

recipes.name: Lokum Burger
recipes.details: This burger made with marinated steak fillet is almost every customers’ favourite lunch. Especially sliced steak with caramelized onions adds an incredible taste, along with the homemade french fries. Enjoy eating the famous by the hands of Turkish best chefs!
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. In a bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, onion, egg, salt, and black pepper.
2. Form into four patties.
3. Grill or cook in a skillet over medium-high heat until cooked through.
4. Top each patty with a slice of American cheese and let it melt.
5. Toast hamburger buns and spread mayonnaise and ketchup on the bottom half.
6. Top with a burger patty, lettuce, and tomato. Cover with the top half of the bun.
7. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Lahmacun
recipes.details: Lahmacun is a popular Turkish dish that consists of thin, crispy dough topped with a flavorful mixture of ground lamb, onions, tomatoes, and spices. It's perfect for a quick lunch or dinner and can be enjoyed on its own or with a side salad.
ingredients: 12-14 pieces of thin pizza dough or pita bread
recipes.cookingMethod:
1. Preheat oven to 450°F.
2. In a large bowl, combine ground lamb, onion, tomato, tomato paste, paprika, cumin, salt, black pepper, parsley, mint, lemon juice, and olive oil.
3. Divide the dough into 12-14 pieces and roll each piece into a thin round shape.
4. Spread a thin layer of the lamb mixture over each dough round.
5. Place the lahmacun on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are crispy and the lamb mixture is cooked through.
6. Serve hot with lemon wedges and a side salad.

chefBio: Arda Türkmen is a highly skilled chef with over 12 years of experience in the industry. She specializes in Turkish cuisine and has worked in some of the most prestigious restaurants in Paris.
